definition: Louis Pasteur (1822-1895), French chemist and microbiologist
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: The cases have been laboratory confirmed by the Institut Pasteur, Dakar.
sentences.chinese: 这些病例已得到达喀尔巴斯德研究所的实验室确认。

sentences.english: The process is named for Louis Pasteur, its originator.
sentences.chinese: 首创者是巴斯德，并以其姓氏命名。

sentences.english: Like many surnames, Louis Pasteur's probably once indicated a profession.
sentences.chinese: 像很多姓氏一样，巴斯德的姓氏在过去暗指专业。

sentences.english: Louis Pasteur noted in 1858 that bacteria died when they were doused with garlic.
sentences.chinese: 1858年路易斯，巴斯德指出，大蒜浸泡杀灭细菌。

sentences.english: The case has been laboratory confirmed for Yellow fever by the Institut Pasteur, Dakar.
sentences.chinese: 达喀尔市巴斯德研究所实验室确认了该起黄热病病例。

sentences.english: Pasteur 's work showed that fermentations are "vital processes".
sentences.chinese: 巴斯德的研究说明了发酵是“生命过程。”

sentences.english: Laboratory analysis of the specimens is ongoing at the Institut Pasteur in Yaoundé.
sentences.chinese: 雅温得巴斯德研究所正在对标本作出实验室分析。

definition: Boyle (name)/Robert Boyle (1627-91), British and Irish scientist and pioneer chemist
Rutherford (name)/Ernest Rutherford (1871-1937), early nuclear physicist from New Zealand
Wilhelm Conrad Röntgen (1845-1923), German mechanical engineer
Leibnitz (name)/Gottfriend Wilhelm von Leibniz (1646-1716), German mathematician and philosopher, co-inventor of the calculus
Leibniz (name)/Gottfriend Wilhelm von Leibniz (1646-1716), German mathematician and philosopher, co-inventor of the calculus
